-- Create your Credential for the External Data Source
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL WorkspaceIdentity
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'

-- Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [HelloWorld]
WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'https://blogmsdemodl.dfs.core.windows.net/blogmsdemofs/Raw/helloworld',
    CREDENTIAL = [WorkspaceIdentity]
)

-- Create View in Synapse
CREATE VIEW kompa AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'SloveniaTestData.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'HelloWorld',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR =',', 
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
WITH (
    [country_code] VARCHAR (5) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,
    [country_name] VARCHAR (100) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,
    [year] smallint,
    [population] bigint
) AS [r];

-- Check you can Query the View in Synapse
Select * From [dbo].[kompa]

-- Setup Synapse Access for Logic App
CREATE LOGIN [logicappkompa] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER
CREATE USER [logicappkompa] FROM LOGIN [logicappkompa]

-- Grant the Logic App Service Principal access to use the scoped credential
GRANT REFERENCES ON DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL::WorkspaceIdentity to [logicappkompa];

-- Grant the logic app Service Principal access to query the view
GRANT SELECT ON OBJECT::[dbo].[kompa] TO [logicappkompa] 

SELECT  top 1 [AR_base_64_coded]
 FROM [dbo].[kompa]
